title: What Happens After Overeating......
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>One, two... Huff, huff... Three, four...... Huff, huff......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hanayo...... You’ve gotten rounder, haven’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh! T-That’s not true...? I think......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>That’s a lie. You’ve definitely gotten rounder! You ate a lot of mochi, didn’t you!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-I did~~!! I ate a lot of mochi and a whole lot of other food. I ate a ton~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ugh...... I knew it. If that’s the case, you have to do that thing immediately.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>A diet! You need to go on a D-I-E-T. A diet! Beginning today, you must cease eating mochi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>N-Nooo~~~!!! It was just for New Year’s~~~!!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No more blabbering! Come on, we’re going for a run right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
